title: About
text: Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see https://quarto.org.

title: About
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

1 + 1

[1] 2


You can add options to executable code like this


[1] 4


The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

title: About
text:
Current Work

Business Intelligence Engineer, Snap! Finance

My focus is on the Collections Department of the business, although lately I am assisting with the data migration of a LMS (Loan Management System). Saving money, making money, keeping the money flowing… everyday!
Manage dashboards that uses R Shiny and are hosted on the company’s server, Posit Connect
Clean and prepare data from various sources (AWS S3, Presto/Postgre databases)
Automate reports (Anomaly detection, daily scripts, PowerPoints)

title: About
text:
Education

Utah Valley University

BS Information Systems, Business Intelligence 2016-2020

title: About
section: What can I do for you?
text:
What can I do for you?
A question better suited for you, but I will list some things here:

Build interactive and compelling visuals (Highcharts, Plotly, GGPlot etc.)
Build interactive Dashboards in little time (RShiny, ZenDash, Tableau)
Analyze data and tell a story to help stakeholders understand the findings
Build and maintain ETL processes

Airflow, Presto, PostgreSQL, Posit Connect (RStudio)

Experiment analysis (A/B testing, stats)
Prophet model forecasting
